Notes (excluding departure fees): Visa not required for holders of a copy of a parent's passport proving that they are citizens of *All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry[3] Women passengers should cover their body with clothing, except for the face, hands, and feet[4]

May Apply Online.[6] Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for passengers of Albanian origin[citation needed] Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states and the United States[citation needed] Visa on arrival for holders of a letter issued by the Albanian Ministry of Interior confirming that a visa has been approved before departure
Passengers must hold proof of sufficient funds to cover their stay and documents required for their next destination[citation needed]
Multiple-entry Schengen visa is required to enter and exit Andorra[9]

Visa not required for personnel of oil companies established in Angola, provided they present a photocopy of their passport, 4 photos, and a copy of a visa application which should be submitted by the oil company at least 2 weeks prior to arrival[11] Visa on arrival for holders of a confirmation that a visa has been approved before departure[citation needed] International Certificate of Vaccination is required[citation needed]

Obtainable online[14] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Canada, European Union member states, the United Kingdom, and the United States Visa waiver fee applies for valid visa holders or residents of the United States[citation needed] Departure tax applies[15]
All visitors are fingerprinted and photographed upon entry[17]
Valid for 120 days within 1 year Obtainable online[19] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Valid for 180 days within 1 year[citation needed]

May Apply Online (Online Visitor e600 visa)[21] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Passengers traveling on domestic sectors of international flights within Australia must hold passports, or passport replacing documents accepted by Australia[citation needed] Valid Australian visas in a full or expired Lebanese passports are accepted if accompanied by a new Lebanese passport. Verification by airlines using Australia's Advanced Passenger Processing (APP) System will require the details of the travel document that contains the Australian visa[citation needed] Passengers who have a criminal conviction record may be refused entry or transit[citation needed]

Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 30 days for residents of the GCC member states. They must travel with a national of the said GCC country[citation needed] Visa on arrival for holders of an official invitation letter issued by the State Migration Service of Azerbaijan or other Azerbaijan government authority[citation needed] Visa on arrival for staff of the Asian Development Bank (ADB) and their dependants, provided they present an official invitation letter issued by the Asian Development Bank (ADB)[citation needed] Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 30 days for holders of an official invitation letter issued by the Operating Committee of Baku Chess Olympiad or an accreditation card issued by the International Chess Federation (FIDE)[citation needed] The visa application form may be filled online and submitted to the diplomatic mission[24] Obtainable online through approved travel agencies.[25][26] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel Applicants of Armenian ancestry or with Armenian visas in their passport may not obtain a visa[citation needed] Registration with the local police upon arrival is mandatory[citation needed] Registration with the State Migration Service is mandatory for stays over 15 days[citation needed]
The visa can be obtained through British diplomatic missions[citation needed]

E-visa Obtainable online ONLY for holders of a valid visit visa to UAE, UK, USA, KSA (excluding Hajj & Umrah visa), Schengen or USA Green Card. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[30] Visa not required for a maximum stay of 1 day for valid visa holders or residents of Saudi Arabia providing hey continue their journey by land using the Causeway to Saudi Arabia.[citation needed] Visa on arrival for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports[citation needed] Multiple-entry Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for a maximum stay of 2 weeks per visit for residents of the GCC member states[31][32][33]

Visa not required for holders of passports or other travel documents endorsed with a "No Visa Required" stamp[citation needed] Visa on arrival for passengers of Bangladeshi origin[citation needed] Visa on arrival for spouses and children of passengers of Bangladeshi origin provided they present return/onward tickets for a maximum stay of 30 days[citation needed] Visa on arrival for holders of a confirmation letter issued by the Bangladesh Board of Investment (BOI) containing a BOI registration number and traveling on business provided they present return/onward tickets. The accredited inviting organization must notify the Immigration authorities prior to arrival[citation needed] Extensions of stay is possible for a fee[35] Departure tax applies[36]

Visa not required for a maximum stay of 10 days at Brest (BQT), Augustow Canal, or Grodno (GNA) provided holding a confirmation issued by a travel agency[39][40][41][42] Visa not required for a maximum stay of 5 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states. Must arrive via Minsk International Airport[43] Visa not required for passengers visiting to Belovezhskaya Pushcha National Park for up to 3 days[44] Visa on arrival at the Minsk International Airport if the support documents were submitted to the Consular Division at Minsk (not later than 3 (for short-term visas) or 5 working days (for long-term visas) the expected date of arrival[45] Visa on arrival at the Minsk International Airport for holders of an invitation letter issued by a Belarusian tourist company or a medical or health organization. The letter must be written on afficial headed paper with the passenger's name, passport details, purpose, and duration of stay. The letter must also have the original signature and official seal of the head of the inviting organization[citation needed] Passengers are required to have a health insurance which can be purchased on arrival at the Minsk International Airport[citation needed] Transiting without a visa is not allowed under any circumstance[citation needed] Registration with the local police within 7 days of arrival is mandatory[citation needed]

Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states or the United States[citation needed] Passengers must hold at least $50 a day and documents required for their next destination Departure tax applies[48]

Obtainable online[50] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Visa not required for holders of an "autorisation spéciale d'entrée au Bénin" joining mercy ships[citation needed] International Certificate of Vaccination is required[51]

Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 15 days for passengers who sent their application by a tour operator to the department of tourism at least two and a half months in advance, provided they present two passport photos[53] Visas are issued only to tourists booked with a local licensed tour operator[54]

Valid for 90 days within 180 days[citation needed] Extensions of stay is possible for a maximum stay of 5 months for a fee[56] Departure tax applies[57] Obtainable Online[58][citation needed] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed]

Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 6 months for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states and the United States[60][61] Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory[citation needed]

Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports[citation needed] Eligible to apply for three-year visas valid for tourism and business trips and may use them whenever they visit Brazil within that period[64] Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of a VIPER visa issued by Brazil[citation needed]
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry Immigration offences, such as visa overstaying, are punishable by jail, fines, and caning[66]
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states[citation needed]

Visa on arrival for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports[citation needed] Visa on arrival for holders of Interpol passports travelling on duty provided they present one passport photo. BCN INTERPOL in Burkina Faso must be informed before arrival International Certificate of Vaccination is required[citation needed]

Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 1 month for holders of an "Entry Authorization" letter issued by the authorities of Burundi before departure[citation needed] All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry[citation needed]

Valid for 30 days per trip[citation needed] Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum stay of 12 months for a fee[72] Passengers not permitted to make day trips that arrive and depart on the same day, except when arriving and departing at Phnom Penh (PNH) airport or hold a multiple-entry business visa[citation needed] Obtainable online[70] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Visa on arrival for passengers who were born in Cambodia[citation needed] All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry and exit[73]

Visa not required for holders of an ID card for International Organization Visa on arrival to holders of a confirmation that a visa has been approved before departure and issued by "Le Delegue General de la Surete"[citation needed] International Certificate of Vaccination is required

Visa not required for holders of a Green Card issued by the United States unless deemed inadmissible.[76] Transit Visa is required except for holders of a B or C visa issued by Switzerland when traveling to the United States flying with Air Canada[76] Visa not required for holders of a valid student or employment authorization and/or holders of a Parapan Identity and Accreditation Card (PIAC)[citation needed] Obtainable online for visitor, study, work, medical, and permanent residence visas.[77] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel Passengers who have a criminal conviction record may be refused entry or transit[78]

Valid for 90 days within 180 days[citation needed] Obtainable at Nelson Mandela International Airport, Cesária Évora Airport, Amílcar Cabral International Airport and Aristides Pereira International Airport Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports[citation needed] Visa not required for former citizens of Cape Verde, alongside their spouse and children[citation needed] International Certificate of Vaccination is required[80]

Passengers over the age of 15 not presenting return or onward tickets must pay a deposit to a bank or the transporting airlines between 15,000 XAF AND 250,000 XAF depending on the country of commencement of the journey[citation needed] International Certificate of Vaccination is required[82]

Visa on arrival for holders of an Entry Authorization Letter issued by Chad before departure[citation needed] International Certificate of Vaccination is required[citation needed] Registration with the local police within 72 hours of arrival is mandatory[citation needed]

Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports[citation needed] Visa on arrival for holders of an Entry Authorization Letter issued by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs[citation needed]

Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 6 days for passengers traveling for tourism purposes in a group organized by a Chinese international tour operator or registered travel agency provided they are arriving from Hong Kong or Macao to take a trip to the Zhujiang Delta in Guangdong province or arriving or departing at or to Dongguan (DGM), Guangzhou(CAN), Huizhou (HUZ), Shantou (SWA), Shenzhen (SZX) or Zhuhai (ZUH)[citation needed] Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for holders of a Port Visa notification[citation needed] Visa on arrival at Beijing (PEK) for a maximum stay of 3 months for holders of a confirmation that a visa has been approved before departure. The airlines must fax all documents to the station managed prior to arrival and the passenger must have a confirmation from the Immigration authorities that the visa will be issued on arrival, two passport photos, a passport that contains at least 1 blank visa page, and an invitation letter issued by the Chinese Authorities or by a sponsor approved by the Chinese authorities who must meet the passenger on arrival[citation needed] Visa on arrival at Chendgu (CTU), Fuzhou (FOC), Shanghai ( (Hongqiao (SHA) Pudong (PVG), or Xiamen (XMN) for a maximum stay of 1 month holders of a confirmation that a visa has been approved before departure provided they present a letter of invitation issued by the immigration authorities that the visa will be issued on arrival, two passport photos, a confirmed return or onward ticket, a passport that contains at least one blank visa page, and a sponsor approved by the Chinese authorities is there to meet the passenger on arrival[citation needed] All visitors between the ages of 14 and 70 are fingerprinted upon entry and exit[86] Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory[citation needed]

e-VIsa 7 days.[94] Visa on arrival for passengers of Democratic Republic of Congo origin[citation needed] Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 7 days for holders of a letter ("visa volant") issued by the Ministry of Interior and Security[citation needed] Passengers not holding visas issued in their country of residence will be refused entry (unless there is no embassy of the Democratic Republic of the Congo in their country of residence)[citation needed] Registration with the local police upon arrival is mandatory[citation needed] Departure tax applies[95] International Certificate of Vaccination is required[citation needed]

Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of Canada[citation needed] Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid multiple-entry visa holders or residents of Japan or the United States used at least once and valid for at least 6 months beyond the period of intended stay[citation needed] Costa Rican visas should be used within 60 days after the date of issuance[citation needed] Departure tax applies[97]

Obtainable online[99] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Electronic Visa holders must arrive at Port Bouet Airport[citation needed] Visa on arrival for holders of an approved pre-enrolment and a registration receipt before departure[citation needed] Visa on arrival for holders of an invitation letter issued by the authorities of Côte d'Ivoire[citation needed] International Certificate of Vaccination is required[citation needed]

Visa not required for holders of a Person of Indian Origin (PIO) Card[citation needed] Visa not required for holders of an Overseas Citizen of India" card or booklet[citation needed] Passengers arriving from Guinea, Liberia, Mali and Sierra Leone at Bangalore (BLR), Chennai (MAA), Cochin (COK), Delhi (DEL), Hyderabad (HYD), Kolkata (CCU) or Mumbai (BOM) are subject to enhanced passenger screening and medical checks[citation needed] Holders of visas that specifically state the city or airport of entry must enter India at that specified city or airport[citation needed] All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry[citation needed]

Valid for 3 months within 6 months[citation needed] May use their ID cards[citation needed] The visa-free facility is not applicable for holders of emergency or temporary passports thus they should obtain a visa beforehand[citation needed] Iris scan taken upon entry and departure[citation needed]

Visa on arrival at Almaty (ALA) and Nur-Sultan (TSE) Airports for those arriving from a country without a Kazakh representation and are holding a confirmation from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs that a visa has been approved before departure. Printed visa authorization and an Electronic Visa Issuance Confirmation issued by the Ministry of Justice must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Visa not required if arriving at and departing from Jeju (CJU) Airport[citation needed] Visa not required for passengers who have previously entered Korea (Rep.) at least 4 times within the last 2 years or at least 10 visits in total[186][187] Visa Exemption for 30 days for those who are in transit through South Korea, provided they present a physical visa or a residence permit issued by the following countries and are arriving at South Korea from one of these countries and continuing to a third country, or arriving from a third country and continuing to one of these countries.  Australia1  Canada  European Union  New Zealand  United States 1 - Holders of e-visas or e-resident permits are only permitted visa-free entry if they depart from Australia. Obtainable online[193] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Electronic visa holders must arrive via Manas International Airport or Osh Airport or through land crossings with China (at Irkeshtam and Torugart), Kazakhstan (at Ak-jol, Ak-Tilek, Chaldybar, Chon-Kapka), Tajikistan (at Bor-Dobo, Kulundu, Kyzyl-Bel) and Uzbekistan (at Dostuk).[194]

Valid for 90 days within 180 days[citation needed] Obtainable at Tribhuvan International Airport and certain land borders Obtainable online[242] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel Extensions of stay is possible for a fee[243][244] The visa-on-arrival (VoA) facility is not applicable for holders of temporary passports thus they should obtain a visa beforehand[citation needed]

Holders of an Australian Permanent Resident Visa or Resident Return Visa may be granted a New Zealand Resident Visa on arrival permitting indefinite stay (pursuant to the Trans-Tasman Travel Arrangement), subject to meeting character requirements and obtaining an Electronic Travel Authority prior to departure.[247]

Visa on arrival for valid visa holders or residents of Canada, the European Union member states, or the United States for a maximum stay of 30 days[citation needed] Passengers must obtain a tourist card which can be purchased on arrival for $2[citation needed]

Visa not required for a maximum stay of 15 days for valid visa holders or residents of Canada, the European Union member states, the United Kingdom, or the United States. Visitors must have a confirmed hotel reservation, health insurance and a return ticket.[258] Holders of a visa or entrance stamp of the Emirate of Dubai that is valid for at least 21 days are visa exempt.[259] Holders of a visa for Qatar that is valid for travel to Oman and valid for at least one month are visa exempt when arriving directly from Qatar.[260] Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum stay of 2 months for a fee[citation needed]

Obtainable online[261] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel Electronic Travel Authorization to obtain a visa on arrival for business purposes.[262] Visa not required for holders of a Pakistan Origin Card (POC)[citation needed] Visa not required for holders of a National Identity Card for Overseas Pakistani (NICOP)[citation needed] Visa not required for holders of passports issued by the Republic of Lebanon containing a "Visa exempt" stamp issued by Pakistan[citation needed] Visa not required for passengers of Pakistani origin for a maximum stay of 72 hours provided they are travelling due to an emergency and have dual nationality with Pakistan and passports are appropriately endorsed[citation needed] Visa on arrival for holders of an approval from the immigration authorities at the intended post of arrival provided holding a recommendation letter from the Chamber of Commerce & Industries (CC&1) in the Republic of Lebanon or country or residence abroad, an invitation letter from a business organization recommended by the concerned trade organization in Pakistan, or a recommendation letter by Investor Consular of Board of Investment posted at Pakistan diplomatic missions abroad[263][262][264][265]
Valid for 30 days per trip Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum stay of 90 days for a fee[267]

Visa not required for those who were born in Panama[citation needed] Visa not required for holders of an ID card or Birth Certificate issued by Panama Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for holders of a printed Travel Authorization Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of Australia, Canada, the European Union member states, Japan, the United Kingdom, the United States, Singapore, or South Korea Passengers who have a criminal conviction record may be refused entry or transit[citation needed]
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports[citation needed] All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry[citation needed]
Visa not required for a maximum stay of one year for former citizens of the Philippines (Balikbayans)[citation needed] Departure tax applies[273]
Valid for 30 days per trip[citation needed] Visa is issued free of charge[citation needed] Available at Hamad International Airport[277]

May Apply Online[279] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states[citation needed]

Visa not required for a maximum stay of 72 hours when entering Russia through the ports of Anadyr, Kaliningrad, Korsakov, Novorossiysk, Sevastopol,[281] Sochi, St.Petersburg, Vladivostok, and Vyborg by ferry[282] Registration with the local police within 7 working days of arrival is mandatory[citation needed] The visa application form may be filled online and submitted to the diplomatic mission[283]

Valid for 30 days per trip[citation needed] Extensions of stay is possible for a fee[285] Obtainable online[286] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] International Certificate of Vaccination is required[citation needed] All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry[citation needed]
Obtainable online[288] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed]
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 1 day for cruise ship passengers[290]
Visa not required for passengers of Vincentian origin provided they present a copy of their parent's birth certificates accompanied by their own birth certificate[citation needed]
Valid for 60 days per trip[citation needed] Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum stay of 1 month for a fee[293] Departure tax applies[294][295]
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states[citation needed]

Obtainable online[299] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Visa not required for a maximum stay of 15 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states and the United States[citation needed] Visa not required for spouses and children of former citizens of São Tomé and Príncipe who is born in São Tomé and Príncipe[citation needed] International Certificate of Vaccination is required[citation needed]

All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry[301] Residents of GCC countries can apply for Saudi eVisas online and residents of the United States, United Kingdom and European Union may apply for a visa on arrival.[302]

Visa not required for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports[305][306] Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states and the United States
Valid for 3 months within 6 months[citation needed] Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for a fee[308]

Valid for 30 days Visa on arrival for holders of a confirmation from the immigration that a visa has been approved before departure[citation needed] International Certificate of Vaccination is required[citation needed]
Obtainable online[311] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry and exit[312]
Registration with the local police within 3 working days of arrival is mandatory[citation needed]
Registration with the local police within 72 hours of arrival is mandatory[citation needed]
Visa on arrival for holders of a confirmation that a visa has been approved before departure[citation needed]

Valid for 30 days per trip[citation needed] Obtainable at t Bosaso (BSA), Galcaio (GLK), Garowe (GGR), Kisimayu (KMU), and Mogadishu (MGQ)[citation needed] Visa on arrival for holders of an invitation letter issued by the government of Somaliland[citation needed] Visa on arrival for passengers of Somali origin provided they were born in Somalia[citation needed] Passengers must exchange or equivalent of other freely convertible foreign currency upon arrival[citation needed]
Holders of passports without 2 blank visa pages may be refused entry[citation needed] Visa Free Access announced. Dates to be confirmed.[317]

Obtainable online[319] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[319] Visa on arrival for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports Visa on arrival for passengers of Sudanese origin Visa on arrival for holders of an identity card copy issued by the United Nations with a clearance from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in South Sudan

Valid for 30 days per trip[citation needed] Electronic Travel Authorization is obtainable online, at Sri Lanka diplomatic missions abroad, or on arrival at any port of entry in Sri Lanka[citation needed] Obtainable online[322] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum stay of 150 days for a fee[323]

Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 60 days for holders of an "Entry Permit" issued by the Sudanese Ministry of interior[citation needed] Visa on arrival for passengers of Sudanese origin from the father's side provided they present a national ID number, a national ID card, or an old Sudanese passport or birth certificate[citation needed] Visa on arrival for spouses married to a Sudanese national provided holding a marriage certificate Registration with the local police within 3 days of arrival is mandatory[citation needed]
An entrance fee of 25 USD or 25 Euros must be paid online prior to arrival.[326]

Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports[329] The form may be filled online and submitted to the diplomatic mission[330][331]
According to the Law No. 2 of 2014 all visitors require visas prior to arrival.[333][334][335] Departure tax applies[336]

Valid for 45 days per trip[citation needed] Obtainable at Dushanbe International Airport[citation needed] Obtainable online.[338] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel E-visa holders can enter through all border points[339] Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum stay of 60 days for a fee[340] Tajikistan plans to completely abolish visa requirements soon[341][342][343]
May apply online but requires a Referral Visa.[345] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed]

Passengers over 12 years of age with a visa are required to hold at least 20,000 THB per person or 40,000 THB per family as proof of sufficient funds to cover their stay. Proof of funds includes letters of credit vouchers, MCO's or well-known credit cards which are honored in Thailand[citation needed]
For arrivals by air only[348] Valid for 30 days per trip Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum stay of 90 days for a $75[349]
Visa on arrival for holders of a confirmation from the immigration that a visa has been approved before departure[citation needed]

Visa not required for residents of the GCC member states for a maximum stay of 15 days. The residence permits must be valid for a minimum of 6 months from the arrival date[citation needed] Visa not required for passengers traveling on an organized tour[citation needed]

Valid for 90 days within 180 days[citation needed] Extensions of stay is not possible, but passengers exceeding the period of 90 days within 180 days should obtain a residence permit ("Ikamet Vesikasi") from the immigration police and must be presented to airport officials upon departure[citation needed]

Visa on arrival for maximum stay of 10 days extendable for another 10 days for holders of a letter of invitation issued by a company registered in Turkmenistan and approved by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs[citation needed] Special permits from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs are required prior to arrival if visiting Atamurat, Cheleken, Dashoguz, Serhas, and Serhetabat Departure tax applies[356]
Valid for 1 month per trip[citation needed] Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for a fee[358]

Valid for 3 or 6 months per trip, fees may vary accordingly[360] Obtainable at Entebbe Airport in Kampala[citation needed] Obtainable online[361] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Must apply online at least 2 business days or more prior to travel.[361] As of March 2017, airlines were refusing passengers permission to board flights to Uganda if they did not have a print-out of the document showing that they had successfully applied for an eVisa. Ugandan immigration authorities also may require additional documentation, including proof of a return plane ticket and detailed tour itinerary in Uganda.[citation needed] Extensions of stay is possible for a fee[362] All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry[363][dubious – discuss] International Certificate of Vaccination is required[citation needed]
Visa not required for passengers under 18 year of age provided their name is mentioned in parent/guardian's visa[citation needed]

Visa on arrival for residents of the GCC member states for a maximum stay of 1 month[citation needed] Electronic Visas online via www.ednrd.ae if residing in one of the 5 other GCC countries. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel [366] Obtainable online if arriving on Air Arabia,[367] Emirates,[368] Etihad,[369] Air Baltic,[370] Air Berlin,[370] Air Serbia,[371] and flydubai.[372] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for a fee[373] Iris scan taken upon entry[citation needed]
Transit Visa required, unless other exemptions apply for Visa-free Direct Airside Transit[375]

Visa not required for holders of a Form I-512 (Authorization for Parole of an Alien into the United States")[citation needed] Visa not required for passengers who are admitted to the United States on a visa and are returning to the United States after a visit for a maximum stay of 30 days to Canada, Mexico, or adjacent islands except Cuba[citation needed] Obtainable online for non-immigrant visas (DS-160). However, the applicant must attend a scheduled interview at the nearest United States diplomatic mission[376][377] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Holders of F or J visas must present an endorsed SEVIS Form I-20MN. Form SEVIS I-20AB for M visa holders, and Form SEVIS DS-2019 for F or J visa holders[citation needed] All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry[378] Passengers who have a criminal conviction record may be refused entry or transit[citation needed]
Visa not required for passengers who were born in Uruguay[citation needed]

Obtainable online[380] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Visa not required for a maximum stay of 5 days for land transits across airports[381] Visa on arrival for holders of a Visa Confirmation (stamp) issued by a Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Uzbekistan can obtain a visa on arrival at Tashkent (TAS) provided holding two colored passport photos Registration with the local police within 3 days of arrival is mandatory[citation needed]

Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports[citation needed] All visa applications must be submitted in person, and all applicants will be interviewed at the diplomatic mission[385]

Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days at Phu Quoc (PQC) Airport[citation needed] Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days at Hanoi (HAN) or Ho Chi Minh City (SGN) airports for those travelling to Phu Quoc (PQC) on the same day provided holding an onward connecting flight on the same day to Phu Quoc (PQC). They must clear immigration at Hanoi (HAN) or Ho Chi Minh (SGN) and transfer to domestic terminal for an onward connecting flight to Phu Quoc (PQC)[citation needed] Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for holders of a Certificate of Visa Exemption issued to former citizens of Vietnam residing abroad[citation needed] Visa on arrival at Hanoi (HAN) for holders of a confirmation from the Vietnamese Immigration (Ministry of Public Security) that a visa has been approved before departure[citation needed] Visa on arrival at Hanoi (HAN), Ho Chi Minh City (SGN), Da Nang (DAD), or Nha Trang (CXR) airports for a maximum stay of 3 months for holders of a confirmation from the Consular Department (Ministry of Foreign Affairs) that a visa has been approved before departure Obtainable online through travel agencies available at Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Phu Quoc or Da Nang airports.[387][388] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel

Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports[citation needed] Visa not required for passengers of Yemeni origin[citation needed] Registration with the local police is mandatory[citation needed] Exit visa is required for stays over 30 days[390]

Obtainable online[393] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Visa not required for minors if they are mentioned in the passport of one of their parents[citation needed] Holders of passports without 2 blank pages may be refused entry[citation needed] All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry[citation needed] International Certificate of Vaccination is required

Obtainable online[396] Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel[citation needed] Visa on arrival for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports[citation needed] For tourism purposes only; travellers holding only a tourism class visa are strictly prohibited from engaging in business activities[citation needed]
